display_name: Filtered: Overall Non-rem RDI at 2% desat
description: Non-REM RDI at 2% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 2% desat) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculations: 60*(hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 + manrbp2 + manrop2) / (slpprdp - minremp)
